Content.Text:
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's wrong, honey? Aren't you feeling well?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll need <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>G if I'm going to help you recover
your Stamina. Is that okay?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll need <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>G if I'm going to help you recover
your Health. Is that okay?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is the clinic, honey. If you're ever feeling
sick or low on stamina, come see me and I'll
make you feel all better.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what a pity. Well, just let me know when
you do need me, then.
<PAGE>
Bye, now. Don't be a stranger!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right, I have just the shot to make you feel
full of energy again. Now, hold your arm out...
<PAGE>
It's okay, honey. It won't hurt a bit, I promise.
Relax, relax! You're a grown-up. You can handle
this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Now, I'll just jab this in here, like so!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There. All done! You should be feeling better
already. Come back and see me again whenever
you're under the weather!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right, I have just the shot to make you feel
right as rain again. Now, hold your arm out...
<PAGE>
It's okay, honey. It won't hurt a bit, I promise.
Relax, relax! You're a grown-up. You can handle
this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Now, I'll just jab this in here like so!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There. All better! You should be feeling just fine,
now. Come back and see me again whenever
you're under the weather.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, honey. The clinic isn't open right now.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness. It looks like you don't have enough
money. Come back once you've saved up
enough, okay, honey?
